Align element text

The alignment utility applies Bootstrap classes to change how an elementâ€™s text is aligned. Like with [display] or [padding] different text alignments can be applied based on the viewport size.

Arguments

tag

A tag object.

default

One of "left", "right", "center", or "justified" specifying the default text alignment of the element.

sm

Like default, but the text alignment is applied once the viewport is 576 pixels wide, think phone in landscape mode.

md

Like default, but the text alignment is applied once the viewport is 768 pixels wide, think tablets.

lg

Like default, but the text alignment is applied once the viewport is 992 pixels wide, think desktop.

xl

Like default, but the text alignment is applied once the viewport is 1200 pixels wide, think large desktop.

Source
